Title: Testify
Description: testify is a testing automation framework for embeded systems. It contains a DSL-Tata and its compiler, a virtual machine TVM and a Notepad++ based IDE which makes the Tata programming a piece of cake.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
testify is a testing automation framework for embeded systems. It contains a DSL-Tata and its compiler, a virtual machine TVM and a Notepad++ based IDE which makes the Tata programming a piece of cake.
